CustomField.description: Business Use: To capture a pin/password/code that providers would like us to quote when calling them about a particular policy. Tech use: n/a Data inputters: Operations Data users: Operations when in contact with providers
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Use this field to capture any information the provider has asked us to quote in relation to a particular policy. For example, Pin numbers, policy reference etc.
CustomField.label: Provider Secret
